articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump critic Chris Christie drops out of Republican race
articles.description: Christie, 61, told a town hall event in New Hampshire that he no longer saw a path forward for his campaign, and repeated warnings about what would happen if Trump were to win the presidential election. "I am going to make sure that in no way do I enable Donald Trump ever (to) be president of the United States again and that's more important than my own personal ambition," he said.
articles.content: Former New Jersey Governor Chris Christie ended his bid for the 2024 Republican presidential nomination on Wednesday after failing to gain momentum for a campaign centered on fierce criticism of the policies and character of frontrunner Donald Trump.... [3554 chars]

articles.content:
He did not immediately endorse another candidate.
